alert.note: Alert for Klamath; Lake (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued September 14 at 1:58PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PDT FRIDAY NIGHT... Oregon Department of Environmental Quality has issued an Air Pollution Advisory for northern Klamath and northern Lake counties... in effect through Friday, with a potential to extend the advisory through the weekend. This includes Crater Lake, Chemult, Crescent, Fort Rock, Silver Lake, and Summer Lake. The Cedar Creek wildfire combined with forecast conditions will cause air quality levels to fluctuate and could be at unhealthy levels. Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. For additional information...please visit the web site at http://www.oregon.gov/deq
